Actions.Text: REFERRED TO RACING, GAMING AND WAGERING

Title: Clarifies certain provisions regarding conflicts of interest of certain public employees
Summary: Clarifies certain provisions regarding conflicts of interest of certain public employees regarding the licensing of a participant in horse racing activities.
LawSection: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and Breeding Law
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the racing, pari-mutuel wagering and breeding law, in relation to conflicts of interest of certain public employees
